mapper.insert: INSERT INTO events (organizerId, title, description, location, pointsAwarded, startDate, endDate) VALUES (#{organizerId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{location}, #{pointsAwarded}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM events WHERE MONTH(startDate) = #{month} AND YEAR(startDate) = #{year}
SELECT * FROM events WHERE startDate >= #{startDate} AND endDate <= #{endDate}

SELECT e.id AS eventId, e.organizerId, e.title, e.description, e.location, e.startDate, e.endDate, e.status, e.pointsAwarded, r.roleName, r.volunteerCount, f.name AS facilityName FROM events e LEFT JOIN eventRoles r ON e.id = r.eventId LEFT JOIN eventFacilities f ON e.id = f.eventId WHERE e.id = #{id}
